"Rank item title cannot be empty!" Once you start ranking no one will be able to edit the ranking list items. Starting ranking allows everyone to rank the items and submit their own ranked list. Are you sure you want to start ranking now? Submit Your Ranked List Submit Your Ranking Edit Your Rank Options Edit Ranking List Aggregate Ranking Results Withdraw your ranking submission and go back to re-rank items This will close the ranking to further submissions. Lock the ranking when you don't want any more ranking submissions. You will be able to unlock the ranking if needed. Are you sure you want to lock this ranking? This will open up the ranking again to accept ranking submissions. Are you sure you want to unlock this ranking? Option cannot be empty 1 person has submitted a ranking "%{n} people have submitted a ranking" No one has submitted a ranking Back to Build Ranking List This will reset everyone's ranking submission. This will reset everyone's ranking submission, and return to Build Ranking List. Are you sure you want to return to Build Ranking List? Collaboratively build and edit the items to be ranked. Where you and others order the ranking items and submit your own ordered list. After submission the results will be shown. Close off the ranking to anymore submissions.
